name: Wrapped Bitcoin-Stacks
description: Wrapped Bitcoin on Stacks (xBTC) is a 1:1 equivalent of BTC on the Stacks network. Wrapped.com lets investors use their digital assets to lend, borrow, and trade on all major DeFi platforms. Each wrapped asset is fully-collateralized and held with a qualified custodian. Wrapped.com is a collaboration of Tokensoft Inc. with leading custodians and other financial institutions. Tokensoft provides the technology layer via Wrapped.com that allows users to wrap their BTC into xBTC.
